changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes ='{\"filter\":\"\",\"mode\":\"query\",\"Query\":\"select distinct concat(department_name ,ProductID,OrderNumber) uniqueId, OrderNumber, ProductID, department_name from shipment_data_v5\",\"Cacheable\":false,\"isStreaming\":\"false\",\"defaultValues\":\"\",\"writeMode\":\"append\",\"params\":\"",\"tableName\":\"\",\"uniqueIdentifier\":\"\"}' where alias = 'ProductDepartmentMapping' and organization ='leo1311';

changeSet.author: leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes ='{\"filter\":\"\",\"mode\":\"query\",\"Query\":\"select distinct concat(OriginPort,ArrivalPort,OrderNumber ) uniqueId, OriginPort, ArrivalPort, FeederVesselEstimatedtimeofArrival, FeederVesselActualTimeOfArrivalDate, OrderNumber from shipment_data_v5\",\"Cacheable\":false,\"isStreaming\":\"false\",\"defaultValues\":\"\",\"writeMode\":\"append\",\"params\":\"",\"tableName\":\"\",\"uniqueIdentifier\":\"\"}' where alias = 'Origindestinationmapping' and organization ='leo1311';

changeSet.author: leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes ='{\"filter\":\"\",\"mode\":\"query\",\"Query\":\"select distinct concat(CarrierName, ContainerId, OrderNumber) uniqueId , OrderNumber, ContainerId, CarrierName from shipment_data_v5 group by uniqueId\",\"Cacheable\":false,\"isStreaming\":\"false\",\"defaultValues\":\"\",\"writeMode\":\"append\",\"params\":\"",\"tableName\":\"\",\"uniqueIdentifier\":\"\"}' where alias = 'ContainerCarrierMapping' and organization ='leo1311';

changeSet.author: leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset set attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"select distinct OrderNumber, OrderNumber uniqueId, Season, planningmarketcode, OrderPlacedDate from shipment_data_v5","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"","tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}' where alias = 'Order' and organization ='leo1311';

changeSet.author: leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE grh_node_details set label_property='ci_name' WHERE node_name='ConfigItem'; UPDATE grh_node_details set node_shape='dot' WHERE node_name='Order';
